students.name: Stella Cook
students.sample_note: Emma did well with scales in C and G major. Struggled with bar 15-16 of Moonlight Sonata. Practice hands separately this week, focus on left hand rhythm.

students.name: James Chen
students.sample_note: James mastered the chord progression for 'Let It Be'. Ready to move to the bridge section. Reminder to practice transitions between F and C chords.

students.name: Lucy Williams
students.sample_note: Lucy showing great improvement in sight reading. Completed Grade 2 pieces. Start Grade 3 book next week. Keep practicing note identification games on Theta.

students.name: Oliver Smith
students.sample_note: Oliver learned intro to 'Wonderwall'. Work on strumming pattern - down down up up down up. Use metronome at 60bpm to start.
